articles.description: Tom Brady will mull his future after the season concludes and take time before committing to a return to football in 2022, sources told ESPN.
articles.content: As the Tampa Bay Buccaneers enter the reality that their season is, at most, three weeks from its conclusion, there is another reality lingering over the organization: the possibility of Tom Brady's … [+2997 chars]

articles.title: Watch: Raj Bawa's Big Hits During Record Knock In India vs Uganda U19 World Cup Match - NDTVSports.com
articles.description: U-19 World Cup: Raj Bawa smashed eight sixes and 14 fours in his 162-run impressive knock.
articles.content: India registered their biggest victory by runs in the U19 World Cup on Saturday after defeating Uganda by 326 runs at the Brian Lara Stadium in Tarouba, Trinidad. Raj Bawa and Angkrish Raghuvanshi we… [+1220 chars]
